abstract: Mohammad Javad Zarif, foreign minister of Iran, arrives in Syria to discuss that nation's civil war with Pres Bashar al-Assad; observers are hoping that such meetings can push forward diplomatic negotiations that will bring an end to crisis in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian minister arrived in Damascus to discuss the civil war in Syria with President Bashar al-Assad while rebel shelling and government strikes killed more than 30 people nearby.

headline.main: Iran’s Foreign Minister Visits Syria for Talks With Assad
headline.print_headline: Top Iranian Official Visits Syria for Talks With President

snippet: The Iranian minister arrived in Damascus to discuss the civil war in Syria with President Bashar al-Assad while rebel shelling and government strikes killed more than 30 people nearby.
